versions.release_notes:
1) Unified Payment Interface (UPI) - New features added to manage your UPI account, link multiple bank accounts to same UPI Virtual ID.
2) Pay merchants near you with UPI and help India go Cashless
3) Now you can receive money in your bank account even if your Bank is not yet UPI-enabled
4) Split your Restaurant, Grocery, Rent, Movie,etc. bills instantly
5) Bug Fixes

1) UI Improvements - Check out our Split-In feature to get an awesome bill splitting experience at restaurants. Split easily by allocating percentage share of the bill to your friends.
2) Now you can share any bill with your friends in the Split-In section
3) Earn rewards in Split-Cash and use this to payback your friends for your share, pay your bill share at merchant restaurants or on Splitkart combos

1) Bug Fixes
2) UI changes
3) Now you can split bills easily with friends without adding them to your contact list if they have Splitkart.

Happy Splitting!!!

store_info.title: UPI App- Pay,Split & Earn
store_info.description:
First Unified Payment Interface (UPI Bank App) enabled Bill Splitting App

Ever faced the problem of awkwardness of sending out IOU mails/SMSes after an outing? Splitkart is designed to remove this awkwardness and create a fun-filled experience of outings with friends and colleagues. Splitkart is a Group Expense Splitting App which makes it easier and more fun for groups, roommates or flat-mates to Split expenses like House Rent, Grocery bills, Restaurant bills, travel expenses, Movie bills, etc. Groups planning to go out for trips or outings can use the Splitkart Expense tracker to keep a track of group expenses.

Splitkart is one of the First Unified Payment Interface (UPI App) enabled Bill Splitting App. The Unified Payment interface provides a secure and instant bank to bank transfer option based on a Unique Identifier. We have partnered with Yes Bank UPI to provide you a secure platform to split bills & transfer money instantly from One Bank account to another.

List of 30 UPI enabled Banks:
•Andhra Bank
•Allahabad Bank
•Axis Bank
•Bank of Baroda
•Bank of Maharashtra
•Bharatiya Mahila Bank
•Canara Bank
•Catholic Syrian Bank
•DCB Bank
•Federal Bank
•HDFC
•HSBC
•ICICI
•IDBI
•IDFC
•Indusind Bank
•Karnataka Bank
•Kotak Mahindra
•Oriental Bank of Commerce
•Punjab National Bank(PNB)
•RBL
•South Indian Bank
•State Bank of India(SBI)
•Standard Chartered Bank
•TJSB
•UCO Bank
•Union Bank of India
•United Bank of India
•Vijaya Bank
•Yes Bank

Important Features of Splitkart

1) Split Share & Track Expenses: The UPI enabled mobile app provides the option of splitting the payment at the point of transaction (Instant Bank to Bank transfer). Any one person in the group can initiate the payment and can either pay the full amount or split it among the group member using the easy to use splitting functionality. Users can track their Group expenses and Settle their bills in their bank account or m-wallet. Roommates and Flat-mates can Split and track expenses like Rent, Grocery bills, electricity bills, Household expenses, travel expenses, Movie & restaurant bills, etc. Split Wisely using Splitkart!

2) UPI & Mobile Wallets: Whenever you want to settle bills or make group payments you need not settle or pay by Cash or Net-Banking. Simply use the Splitkart App to settle up using your mobile. Payment through the Splitkart Expense Sharing App (Official UPI Bank App) is done through the Unified payment interface (UPI)-Instant Bank to Bank transfer, Paytm or PayuMoney Wallet. No Need to download multiple UPI Bank Apps and wallets to split expenses & settle expenses when you have Splitkart.

3) Request Money from friends: If your friend owes you money, use the "Request Money" option to ask your friend to pay you back instantly in your Bank account using UPI.

4) Personal Digital Vasooli Agent: Having issues collecting your money back from friends? Contact our Digital Agent to get back your money.

5) Discover Offers and Perform Tasks to Earn Money: Splitkart offers a variety of Offline and Online deals. The offline deals are of Restaurants in the Delhi/NCR region. Apart from the offline deals their online deals of top online retailers like Dominos, Swiggy, Paytm, Makemytrip, etc. Also there are a lot of Pre-packaged restaurant deals and Online Gift Cards available. Gift Cards of e-commerce retailers like Flipkart, Amazon, Bookmyshow, etc. are available.

In the Earn Money section, you can perform certain tasks and earn money for Free. The tasks include downloading amazing new apps, watching videos and fill forms.

6) Platform to create groups and discuss about offers:The Splitkart In-App chat functionality gives you the option of chatting with your friends and family. People can plan their outing using the Splitkart chat functionality by creating groups and discussing the offers and restaurants.

7) Easy Social Media sharing options: Share group experiences, Offers or Check-in with your family and friends on social media with just few clicks.
store_info.short_description: Split & Pay Bills- First Unified Payment Interface(UPI) enabled Non Bank App
